name: RDKit
short_description: Open-source cheminformatics library written in Python
long_description: RDKit is an open-source library used for pharamacological research, providing tools for molecule representation, prediction, and conversion.

name: Chemistry Development Kit
long_description: CDK is a Java-based open-source library used for storing, retrieving, and performing computations on chemical structures as well as compound property calculations.

name: OpenEye
short_description: Commercial cheminformatics package provides tools for molecular mechanics, pharmacophore modeling, and database searching.
long_description: OpenEye offers the industry-leading solution for computational chemistry problems, providing tools for 3D structure prediction, analysis, and discovery.

name: Schrödinger
short_description: Commercial software suite for drug discovery and structural biology simulations
long_description: Schrödinger is a commercial software suite offering tools for small-molecule and biomolecular simulations, providing insights into the molecular structure nature and interactions.

name: DOCK
short_description: Software for flexible docking between proteins and ligands.
long_description: DOCK predicts and optimizes protein-ligand interactions dynamically for drug discovery and structure-based ligand design.

name: MolSSI
short_description: Molecular Simulation Software for Integrated Investigations.
long_description: MolSSI is a free, open-source collection of molecular simulation packages for short range classical molecular dynamics, Monte Carlo simulations, and equation of state calculations.

name: PhysiFlow
short_description: Open-source software for automating biochemical research.
long_description: PhysiFlow is an open-source workflow system for automating biochemical research, allowing for repeatable and shareable experiments, ACL analysis, and modeling.

name: OBO Better AntiConcept Identification Tool (OBI-TOOL)
short_description: Tool for identifying the best anti-concept for cross-project harmonization.
long_description: OBI-Tool is a software tool for identifying the best anti-concept in biochemical pathways, enabling cross-project harmonization, and providing a standard vocabulary across various biological systems.

name: Open Targets Platform
short_description: A collaborative platform for drug target identification and repurposing.
long_description: Open Targets Platform provides a collaborative space for drug target identification and repurposing by integrating experimental and computation models to predict the therapeutic potential of drugs.
